text: Motion

『'Thank you for your hard work. I've finished my lessons.』
『Is it okay if I go home already for the day?』
『Yeah, It's okay for you to go home for the day. Good work!』

...Hmm? An email...
Ahー……………

Totally forgot to send the data to the other party...
Need to send it right away and apologize...
Thanks for all your hard work...

Hiori, good work!
...How was today's shoot?

Yes...
I've finished everything smoothly.
Motion

And then... they gave us Madeleine as a souvenir,
saying [Please enjoy it with everyone in the office]...
...Would you like one?

Oh, thank you...!
Um... I think I'll have it during the break later.

Y-Yes... Understood...
Sorry for interrupting you while you're working...

Producer-san, please do your best...
I'll excuse myself first.
Motion

Oh... Did I look busy...?
...Ah, sorry...

─Alright, sent...!
Phew...

It's no good... Making mistakes like this... I need to...
be more... diligent... and work hard for everyone's sake...

[The sunset today is so beautiful!]
[Can you see it from where everyone is?]
[I can see it, Meguru-chan.]
[I saw it too. It's such a warm color.]

...Yeah... Before I work hard,
I should take a break and warm up.
